bill_title: An Act to Amend the Kennebunk Sewer District Charter

title.baseline: An Act to Amend the Kennebunk Sewer District Charter
title.improved: An Act to Amend the Kennebunk Sewer District Charter

root_causes_fixed.cause: Fallback pattern did not handle ordinal session format with flexible spacing
root_causes_fixed.fix: Whitespace normalization + improved LD number regex

root_causes_fixed.cause: Line breaks and extra spaces prevented ordinal format matching
Multi-line sponsor blocks with 'and' separators not handled
root_causes_fixed.fix: Normalized whitespace + improved patterns for 'Representative:' with colon

root_causes_fixed.cause: Pattern stopped prematurely when encountering commas in committee name
root_causes_fixed.fix: Updated lookahead to delimit on 'suggested' keyword instead of comma

root_causes_fixed.cause: Line breaks and whitespace prevented pattern matching
root_causes_fixed.fix: Whitespace normalization + optional prefix matching for 'In Senate,'

key_improvement_pattern: Whitespace normalization using ' '.join(text.split()) to handle multi-line text
summary: Successfully fixed 5 of 5 failing extraction methods. Critical fields now at 100% extraction rate. Optional fields at 80% extraction rate. Key innovation: whitespace normalization enables robust pattern matching across multi-line PDF content.
